result.eng: We spent the day on the beach.
result.ga: Chaith muid an lá ar an trá
result.orig: Chaith muid an lá ar an trá
result.html: Chaith muid an lá ar an tráWe spent the day on the beach.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid an lá ar an tráWe spent the day on the beach.

result.eng: We stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ga: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.orig: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.html: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feaḋ píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.

result.eng: After a stormy night I would go out on the beach.
result.ga: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an trá
result.orig: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an trá
result.html: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an tráAfter a stormy night I would go out on the beach.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis oíċe stoirme ṫéinnse amaċ ar an tráAfter a stormy night I would go out on the beach.

result.eng: I go swimming in the pool in Salthill.
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na Trá
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na Trá
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na TráI go swimming in the pool in Salthill.
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa linn snáṁa i mBóṫar na TráI go swimming in the pool in Salthill.

result.eng: Are you working in Salthill still?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ag obair i mBóthar na Trá fós
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ag obair i mBóthar na Trá fós
result.html: An bhfuil tú ag obair i mBóthar na Trá fósAre you working in Salthill still?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ag obair i mBóṫar na Trá fósAre you working in Salthill still?
